title: 36.4 MB Stuck Last Patch EUNE
body: Im having a problem... I opened my lol client and it said there was an update... When i pressed ok the updater started but it is stuck in 36.4MB out of 38.6 for the last 10 mins... i restarted my game millions of times but it is still getting stuck in that same 36.4 number... Help... What can i do?

replies.body: Assuming you have enough space on your hard drive, it's best to leave the patcher alone and let it do its thing.  Scanning and updating could take some time depending on each individual pc or how fast it can read through your hard drive.  Cancelling it could cause your game files to be-rescanned and prolong the update.    Are you or did you previously get any errors?  Let me know!
